detectors.description: Variable Ownable._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#55) is not in mixedCase
BONG.MAX_SUPPLY (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#109) is never used in BONG (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#85-211)

owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#64-66)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#73-76)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#78-82)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- BONG.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#128-134)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- BONG.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#136-142)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BONG.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#144-154)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- BONG.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#156-162)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BONG.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#179-186)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BONG.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BONG.sol#188-196)

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
